Ingredients: 2 part Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial, 1 part Fresh Lime Juice, 1 part Ancho Chile-Infused Simple Syrup, 1 float Ginger Beer, 2 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions:
Punch Preparation Instructions:
Combine Ypioca, lime and syrup in bowl. Top with ginger beer and Angostura bitters* (amounts will depend on size of punch and number of anticipated servings). Garnish with thin-sliced dried ancho chiles and lime wheels to float. 

*You can optionally skip adding Angostura in punch and instead add a dash or 2 to each individual cocktail as served.


Individual Cocktail Preparation Instructions:
Combine ingredients exactly the same way as a traditional Moscow Mule over crushed ice. Garnish with dash or 2 bitters and ancho chile slices. Mint is an optional garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, .5 oz Rocoto passion fruit reduction, .5 oz Fresh lime juice, .5 oz Simple syrup

Ingredients: 1 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 1 fill Champagne, 1 dash Angostura bitters, 1 dash Peach bitters, 1 dash Luxardo Fernet
Instructions: Dash each bitter and the Fernet over sugar cube in base of Champagne glass so that the sugar is fully saturated with mixture. Add Pink Pigeon Rum and top with chilled Champagne. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

Ingredients: 2 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Campari, .5 oz Velvet Falernum, 1 oz Lime Juice, .5 oz Simple Syrup, 3 large chunks Pineapple

Instructions: Combine all ingredients. Shake and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

Ingredients: 2 oz Rhubarb Cucumber & Mint-Infused Junipero Gin, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco, .5 oz Rhubarb Juice, .5 oz Grapefruit Juice, .5 oz Rhubarb Syrup, 2 dash Fee Brothers Celery Bitters
Instructions:
Combine all ingredients in Perlini sparkling cocktail shaker, shake and double strain into cocktail glass. (For home use, combine all ingredients, add ice shake 30 seconds and double strain into coupe, add splash of soda water.)
Spray with atomized Old Tom Gin.
Garnish with cucumber peel or candied rhubarb slice.

*Rhubarb Cucumber & Mint-Infused Junipero Gin:
-- 1 bottle Junipero Gin
-- 1 qt Chopped Rhubarb
-- 1 Chopped Large English Cucumber
-- .5 Bunch (15g) Fresh Mint (with stems)

Combine all ingredients in vacuum sealed bag and circulate at 53º for 2 hours. (For home use, combine all ingredients in plastic container and let rest for one week.)

*Rhubarb Syrup:
Juice 1 qt (8-10 Stalks)
Add to 1 qt of unbleached Cane sugar in saucepan and bring to simmer.
Remove from heat, allow to cool and strain in Chinoise.

Ingredients: 2 part No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 part Real Cranberry Juice, .25 part Luxardo Fernet, .5 part Lime juice, 1.5 part Puer Black Tea
Instructions: Build and pour in punch bowl over large ice block.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 1 oz Luxardo Espresso Italian Liqueur, 1.5 oz Heavy cream, .75 oz Simple syrup
Instructions:
In one shaker, mix heavy cream and simple syrup and dry shake vigorously until it's whipped.
In another, shake Pink Pigeon Rum and Luxardo Espresso with ice.  Pour into a coupe, and then carefully top with the cream.  It should layer perfectly.  The vanilla complexity of the rum pairs awesomely with coffee and cream.

Ingredients: 4 pieces Lime, 1-2 Tbsp Sugar, 1 1/2 oz Ypiòca
Instructions: Cut a lime in 4 pieces and put them in a glass. Add 1-2 tablespoons of sugar and crush with a pestle. Add Ypiòca. Fill with crushed ice. Stir well and enjoy!

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 oz Grapefruit Juice, .75 oz Lemon Juice, 1 dash Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters,  to fill Anchor California Lager
Instructions: Combine Gin, Maraschino, juices, and bitters in an ice-filled mixing tin and shake for 20-30 seconds, or until well chilled. Strain over fresh ice into a Collins glass, top with the California Lager, and garnish with the grapefruit peel.

Ingredients: .5 oz Old Forester Bonded Bourbon, .5 oz H by HINE, 1 oz Rock & Rye, 1 oz Cocchi Americano Rosa,   Activated Charcoal
Instructions: Stir and strain into an old fashioned glass with a large ice cube.

Ingredients: 2 oz Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Ouro Reserva Especial, 1 oz Jalapeno-Orange Simple Syrup, 1 oz Coconut Milk, 4 dash Orange Flower Water, 9 drops Mole Bitters
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker tin and shake vigorously. Double strain using a fine mesh strainer. Serve in a lager glass over ice.

Cocktail Name: Carrier Pigeon (an Airmail with Pink Pigeon)
Ingredients: 1 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz Lime juice, .5 oz Honey
Instructions:
Short shake-strain into champagne flute- top with champagne. 
Drop a Luxardo cherry into the flute.

Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Green Chartreuse, .25 oz Simple syrup, 2 dash Angostura bitters
Instructions: Shake with intent. Double strain in coupe. Garnish with lemon wheel.

Ingredients: 1 oz Applejack, 1 oz Amontillado Sherry, .75 oz Orgeat, .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 bsp Tempus Fugit Creme de Noyaux
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker tin filled with crushed ice. Flash-shake and dump into a double old fashioned glass. Garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Elderflower Liqueur, 2 dash Absinthe,  top Sparkling Wine
Instructions: Combine all ingredients except sparkling wine in a shaker. Add ice and shake until chilled through. Double strain into a champagne flute and garnish with an orange twist.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Chateau de Montifaud Cognac VS, 1 oz Lemon Juice, .25 oz Orgeat (Almond) Syrup, .25 oz Triple Sec,  top Lemonade
Instructions: Pour the Cognac and lemon juice into the glass and then add orgeat syrup; fill with ices cubes and mix with a spoon. At the end, add lemonade and lemon peel.

Cocktail Name: Château Montifaud Lady Touch Triple Sec
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Chateau de Montifaud Reserve Speciale Michel Vallet, .75 oz Triple Sec, 1 oz Lemon Juice, 1 oz Sugar Syrup, 8  Fresh Mint,   Ice Cubes
Instructions: Pour the ingredients in the shaker. Close and shake well until frosted. Strain into the glass. Garnish with fresh mint.

Ingredients: 1 coffee spoon Sugar Syrup, 10  Fresh Mint, .25  Sliced Green Lemon, 1 oz Chateau de Montifaud Cognac VSOP, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Sparkling Water
Instructions: Pour the sugar syrup into the glass and add fresh mint and green lemon. Lightly crush and add ice cubes, Cognac, lemon juice and sparkling water. Mix with a spoon and serve with a straw.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Chateau de Montifaud Cognac XO, 3  Ice Cubes
Instructions: Pour the Cognac into the glass and add ice cubes. Perceive the aromas that are released as a summer rain that reveals the secrets of the nature...

Ingredients: .75 oz Chateau de Montifaud XO Silver, .75 oz Sugar Syrup, .75 oz Lemon Juice, 3  Raspberries,  fill Champagne
Instructions: Pour the Cognac, sugar syrup, lemon juice and 3 pressed raspberries into the shaker, then shake. Strain into the glass (using a cocktail strainer) and fill with chilled Champagne. Garnish with 3 raspberries.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .25 oz Lemon Juice, .25 oz Pages Elderflower Syrup, .25 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
Instructions: Shake well with lots of ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 2 oz Old Tom Gin, .75 oz Carpano Antica, 1 spoon Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 dash Angostura bitters, 2 dash Bittercube cherry bark bitters
Instructions: Stir and strain into stem. Garnish torched star anise and discarded lemon peel.

Ingredients: 2 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 1 oz Dolin Dry Vermouth, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 6 dash Celery Bitters
Instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a fresh cherry tree blossom.

Ingredients: 4 oz Champagne or Prosecco, 1 oz Tart Cherry Juice, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 4 dash Mole Bitters, 1 bsp Luxardo Amaro Abano
Instructions: Stir the cherry juice, Maraschino, bitters and Amaro in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a cocktail coupe and top with Champagne. Garnish with a sprig of thyme.

Ingredients: .5 tsp Demerara Sugar, 1  Roasted Cherry, 2 oz Cherry-Infused Vodka, .25 tsp Amaro di Angostura, .25 tsp Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 5 dash Miracle Mile Forbidden Barrel Aged Bitters
Instructions:
Muddle sugar and 1 roasted cherry in a rocks glass until the sugar has dissolved; add vodka, Amaro, Maraschino, and bitters and stir. Add 1 large ice cube and garnish with half a roasted cherry and the tarragon.

Cherry-Infused Vodka:
- 1 cup pitted cherries, quartered
- 1 cup vodka
Combine cherries and vodka in a bottle; cover, and let sit to meld the flavors for 3-5 days.

Ingredients: .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Laird's Straight Bonded , 1.25 oz Clear Creek Kirschwasser Eau de Vie, .25 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Grapefruit juice, .25 oz Simple syrup, 2 dash Peychaud's Bitters
Instructions: Shake over ice. Strain into a 6 oz. cocktail glass

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 6 oz IPA
Instructions: Stir IPA and Luxardo in a tumbler. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Selecto Acholado Pisco, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, 2-3 drops Angostura Bitters,  top Ginger Ale
Instructions: Add pisco and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Pour ginger ale into the glass to top. Add 2-3 drops of bitters. Garnish with lime wheel.

Ingredients: 1.25 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, .25 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .25 oz Agave Nectar, 3-4 drops Cranberry Bitters, 4 oz Ginger Beer
Instructions: Build in an ice filled 14 oz beer glass, add BarSol Pisco, Ginger Liqueur, fresh lime juice, and agave nectar. Roll into a Boston shaker and shake to mix, place cranberry bitters on top, add ginger beer and garnish with a wedge of fresh lime.

Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, 1.5 oz Grape juice, 1 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), 1 oz Fresh pomegranate juice, .75 oz Cinnamon syrup, .75 oz Fresh lime juice, 4  Grapes
Instructions: Shake and strain into ice filled glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 part Gin, .25 part Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, .75 part Casoni 1814, .5 part Dry Vermouth, 1 part Unfiltered Apple Juice, 1 part Fresh Lemon Juice, .5 part Rich Simple Syrup (2:1), 2 part Jasmine Green Tea
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl, add a large chunk or block of ice, garnish with lemon wheels and apple slices. Serve when punch is chilled.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Classica, 1.5 oz Citrus Agave Blend, 1 splash Soda Water
Instructions: Add soda to bucket first, then add spirits and mixers. Top with ice and garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Luxardo Limoncello, .5 oz Luxardo Aperitivo, 3 oz Tonic water
Instructions: Fill up a stem-less wine glass with ice and pour the ingredients over, stir and serve.

Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Whisky Taketsuru, .5 oz Okinawa sugar, .5 oz Soda, 2 dash Orange Bitters, 2 dash Old Fashioned Bitters
Instructions: Muddle Okinawa sugar with bitters. Add whisky and stir. Top with soda.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .5 oz Krogstad Aquavit, 1 bsp Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, 1 dash Orange Cream Citrate, 1.25 oz Almond Cream Soda
Instructions: Stir all ingredients over cubed ice and then strain over large rock while incorporating the cream soda. Garnish with Italian baking spice infused olive and cherry.

Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Dry Vermouth, .5 oz Curacao, 2 dash Rhubarb Bitters
Instructions: Build all ingredients in a mixing glass. Stir with ice and strain into coupe. Garnish with grapefruit peel.

Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, .75 oz BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, .75 oz Elderflower Liqueur, 2 oz White dry white(preferably Sauvignon), 2 oz Club soda
Instructions: Fill up a wine glass with ice then pour the ingredients, stir and serve.

Ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Coconut milk, 1 1/2 oz Condensed milk, 3 oz Ypiòca, 1 Tbsp Sugar
Instructions: Put 1 1/2 ounces of coconut milk, 1 1/2 ounces of condensed milk, 3 ounces of Ypiòca and tablespoon of sugar in a blender. Mix for a few seconds. Add ice cubes and serve.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, .75 oz Manzanilla Sherry, .75 oz Orange Liqueur, 2 dash Clove Tincture
Instructions: Stir. Strain into Nick & Nora glass. Mist of Pipe Tobacco Tincture.

Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, 1 dash Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters
Instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with a flamed orange peel.

Ingredients: .5 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Rye Whiskey, .5 oz Bourbon, .5 oz Calvados, 1 tsp Demerara Syrup, 2 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 dash Bittermens Xocolatl Mole Bitters
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double rocks glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon twist and orange twist.

Ingredients: 50 ml H by HINE, 25 ml Calvados, 25 ml Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients over ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Ingredients: .75 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or, .75 oz The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Clear, .75 oz Lemon Juice,  rinse Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure
Instructions: Rinse cocktail glass with Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe. Shake rest with ice and strain.

Ingredients: Absolut Citron,Lime juice,Cointreau,Cranberry juice
Instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

Ingredients: Cointreau,Vodka,Lime,Cranberry juice
Instructions: Pour all ingredients in mixing glass half filled with ice, shake and strain into chilled Martini glass.

Ingredients: Spiced rum,Ginger ale
Instructions: Pour 1oz of Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.

Ingredients: 1 oz Pear Brandy, 1 oz Dry Vermouth, .5 oz Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Blanc, .5 oz Dolin Genepy
Instructions:
Barrel aged for 5 months in a used bourbon barrel.

Stir with ice and strain into a small coupe. Garnish with an orange twist.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Clement Creole Shrubb, .75 oz Fino Sherry, 2 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: Stir. Strain into martini glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, 1 1/2 oz Sathenay Crème de Peche, 1/2 oz Fresh Lemon Juice,  oz 2 Dashes Orange Bitters
Instructions: Shake all ingredients in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Strain, and Serve.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Vanilla flavored Vodka, .75 oz Luxardo Limoncello, 1 oz Fresh sweet n' sour, .5 oz Passion fruit puree, .5 oz Egg white, 7 dash Green Tabasco
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Lillet Blanc, 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Rose Wine
Instructions: Build cocktail in glass, add ice and stir. Garnish with rose petal.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, .75 oz Lime Juice , .5 oz Green Chartreuse, .5 oz Velvet Falernum, .5 oz Pineapple Juice
Instructions: Pour over crushed ice with a mint garnish.

Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 1.5 oz Fresh lime juice, .25 oz Simple syrup,  oz Mexican Coca Cola, 1 float Luxardo Fernet
Instructions: Add first three ingredients to a mixing glass with shaker and lightly shake with ice. Pour mixture into a Collins or highball glass over ice. Top with Mexican Coke (or any coca cola as a substitute) and pour Luxardo Fernet on top to float. Garnish with a lime wheel and fresh mint sprig.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Rhum Agricole-style, .75 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz Fresh lime juice, 4 oz Cola, 3 oz Mint sprigs, 2 dash Bitters
Instructions: Place the mint in a Collins glass and muddle for a few seconds to release the oils, then add ice and ingredients, stir well and serve.

Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Velvet Falernum, .75 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 1 oz Unfiltered Apple Juice, 1 oz Lime juice, 3 dash Angostura bitters
Instructions: Shake, strain into a Tiki glass over crushed ice and garnish with a large sprig of mint.

Ingredients: .75 oz Banks 5 Rum, .75 oz Denizen Aged White Rum , .75 oz Denizen Aged White Rum , .75 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano
Instructions: Add all ingredients in mixing glass, stir and strain over 2x2 ice cube in smoked glass on hickory board. Garnish with orange peel and clothes pin.

Ingredients: 2 oz J.H. Cutter Whisky, .75 oz Averna Amaro, .5 oz Alvear PX Sherry, 2 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions:
Combine all ingredients in to a mixing glass and add ice.

Stir for about 10-15 seconds.

Strain in to a cocktail coupe or a glass of your choosing.

Garnish with an orange twist expressed over the top of the drink.

Ingredients: 2 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz Lime Juice, .75 oz Green Chartreuse, .75 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Shake and strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Ingredients: demerara Sugar,Lime,Cachaca
Instructions:
Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an old-fashioned glass.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour the cachaca into the glass.
Stir well.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, .5 oz La Quintinye Vermouth Rouge, .25 oz Pedro Ximenez Sherry, .25 oz Cannella Cinnamon Cordial, 1 dash Angostura bitters
Instructions: Stir and strain into a chilled Nick and Nora glass. Garnish with a clove(2) studded orange coin.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz White peach puree, .25 oz Hibiscus syrup, .25 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Ginger ale
Instructions: Shake all ingredients except ginger ale, then strain into chilled cocktail "coupe" glass. Float ginger ale and zest of fresh lemon.

Ingredients: 2 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Giffard Abricot du Roussillon, .5 oz Egg White
Instructions: Dry shake. Add ice, shake. Double strain into a frozen coupe glass. Garnish with lemon twist or dehydrated apple slice.

Ingredients: .75 oz Rhum Agricole, .75 oz Green Chartreuse, .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Fresh Lime Juice
Instructions: Shake until very cold; double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. No garnish.

Ingredients: 2 oz Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, .5 oz Creme de Cacao, .25 oz Pierre Ferrand Dry Orange Curacao, 3 dash The Bitter Truth Jerry Thomas Bitters
Instructions: In old fashioned glass, lightly muddle orange zest with bitters and orange curacao.  Add bourbon and creme de cacao then stir with ice for proper dilution (depending on ice) and mixing of ingredients.

Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Maurin Quina, 1 oz Luxardo Bitter
Instructions: Stir all 3 ingredients continuously in an ice-filled glass, approximately 20 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass with one large ice cube.

Ingredients: Vodka,Dry Vermouth,Olive Brine,Lemon,Olive
Instructions:
Pour the vodka, dry vermouth and olive brine into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and shake well.
Rub the rim of a martini glass with the wedge of lemon.
Strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the glass and add the olive.
A dirty Martini contains a splash of olive brine or olive juice and is typically garnished with an olive.

Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Apple-infused Wild Turkey Bourbon 101, 1 oz Luxardo Apricot Liqueur
Instructions: Stir and strain up into cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 1 oz Mezcal, .75 oz Aperol, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Lime Juice
Instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add ingredients and shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass and garnish with the grapefruit twist.

Ingredients: 1.75 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Dry Vermouth, .25 oz Curacao, 1 dash Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters
Instructions: Stir. Serve in a small cocktail glass. Lemon twist to garnish.

Ingredients: 1 part No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 part Rooibus Tea (steeped and cooled), 1 part Mulled Cider (cooled), .5 part Clover Honey Syrup, .33 part Cava,   Angostura
Instructions: Combine ingredients into a chilled punch bowl, ice and dilute appropriately, garnish seasonally.

Ingredients: 2 oz Mezcal, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .75 oz Agave Nectar
Instructions:
Shaken and strained over ice in a rocks glass.

*Chapuline, Salt & Chile Pepper Rim:
Grind the chapuline  (dried crickets) and dried chile pepper in a mortar and pestle, as it becomes a powder, throw in the salt and pour onto a plate. Use a fresh lime wedge to moisten the rim of the glass and dip into the powder.

Ingredients: oz Junipero Gin,  oz Lemon,  oz Elder Flower Liquor,  oz Honey Syrup,  oz Carrot Juice
Instructions: Add all ingredients into a shaker, shake strain into a collins glass, fill with crushed ice, garnish with mint leaves.

Ingredients: 2 oz Brandy, .75 oz Orgeat, .75 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .5 oz Lemon Juice, 10 drops Bittermens Burlesque Bitters
Instructions: Shake, strain, lemon twist garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Genevieve Gin, .25 oz Rich Wild Sage Honey Syrup, 1 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 dash Whiskey Barrel Aged Bitters, .75 oz Spring Water
Instructions: Combine all ingredients except Duke's Lemon garnish in mixing glass and stir. Pour into a rocks glass and garnish. Ice does not touch this drink.

Ingredients: 40 ml Pink Pigeon Rum, 10 ml Campari, 10 ml Lavender syrup, 10 ml Lemon juice , 10 ml Orange juice, 25 ml Egg white
Instructions: Dry shake, shake with cubed ice, double strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: Pisco,Lime Juice,Pineapple Syrup,St. Germain,Angostura Bitters,Pepper,Lavender
Instructions:
Shake all ingredients.
Double strain in a chilled double old fashioned glass with abig ice cube.
Garnish with a couple of lavender sprigs

Ingredients: 3 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 tsp Extra Dry Vermouth, 1  Amalfi Lemon
Instructions: Pour the Extra Dry Vermouth into a frozen martini glass (either 7 oz. or 5.5 oz. glass) and coat in a circular motion. Top up the glass with ice cold No.3 gin. Pare the rind of an Amalfi lemon, and give it a twist to extract the oils into the glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Genevieve Gin, .75 oz Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Fresh lemon juice, 1 Tbsp Gooseberry Jam
Instructions: Shake the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Ingredients: .75 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, .75 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .5 oz Mendolera, .5 oz Cane Sugar, .5 oz Lemon, 3 oz Fever-Tree Soda
Instructions: Shake everything except for the soda water, strain into bamboo highball, add soda, add ice, garnish with 3 picked cherries.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Apple & Cinnamon-Infused Karlsson's Gold Vodka, .75 oz J. T. Taylor's Falernum, .5 oz Fresh lemon juice, 1 oz Fresh Cider, 1 tincture Bar Keep Baked apple bitters
Instructions: In a Boston shaker, combine all liquid ingredients with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Double strain into a frozen 4.5 oz. coupe glass. Garnish with the apple slice. Can also be served warm.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, 1.5 oz Chinaco Reposado Tequila, 2 oz Dry Riesling
Instructions: Stir the first two ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled wine glass. Top with chilled wine, stir and serve.

Ingredients: 2 oz Mezcal, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Chinato, 1 oz Campari, 2 dash Rhubarb Bitters, 2 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: Stir all ingredients and pour over 2-inch single ice cube. Garnish with birch smoked sea salt rim and bow tie orange peel.

Ingredients: 1 oz BenRiach Single Malt 12 YO, 1 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, 1 oz Luxardo Aperitivo
Instructions: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass and stir. Strain over a large cube in a rocks glass and garnish with an orange peel.

Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE (Brown Butter-Infused), 0.5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 3 dash Fee Brothers Black Walnut Bitters
Instructions: Combine H by HINE, King's Ginger Liqueur, and bitters over ice in a mixing glass. Stir until you reach proper dilution(15-20 seconds). Strain over a large ice rock in a bucket glass and garnish with Luxardo Cherries.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial, .75 oz Luxardo Bitter, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Lemon Juice, 1 dash Lemon Bitters
Instructions: Served up in a coupe glass.

Ingredients: 2 oz English Harbour Rum 5 YO, 2 oz Fresh Squeezed Pineapple Juice, 2 oz Fresh Coconut Water
Instructions: Build in old fashioned glass over ice.

Ingredients: 2 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Carpano Antica, 1 bsp Calisaya, 3 dash The Bitter Truth Grapefruit Bitters
Instructions: Combine ingredients. Pour over big cube and stir. Add the grapefruit peel.

Ingredients: 1 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Old Overholt Straight Rye Whiskey, .5 oz Rittenhouse Straight Rye Whisky, 1 bsp Rich Demerara Simple Syrup, 3 dash Peychaud's Bitters
Instructions: Stir all ingredients together, strain into a chilled large rocks glass, no ice. Twist a zest of lemon above the drink, dip it once and then discard.

Ingredients: Vodka,Kahlua,Sugar syrup
Instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .75 oz Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), .5 oz Lavander syrup, 1 oz Fresh lime juice, 4  Raspberries
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice then double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with channeled lemon and raspberry on the rim.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, .75 oz Orgeat, .5 oz Lemon Juice, 1 oz Pear & Celery Puree, .5  Egg white
Instructions: Dry Shake (no ice), Wet Shake (with ice) & Double Strain.

Ingredients: 2 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 oz Simple Syrup (1:1), 3 dash Regans' Orange Bitters, 5 large Basil Leaves, 16 whole Black Peppercorns
Instructions: Muddle 4 basil leaves, 16 peppercorns and simple syrup in shaker tin. Add all other ingredients except final basil leaf. Add ice. Shake vigorously. Fine strain into chilled cocktail glass. Express lemon oil from lemon swath over drink. Garnish with lemon swath and final basil leaf.

Ingredients: 2 oz Brandy, .5 oz Orange Cordial, 1 bsp Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 1  Luxardo Cherry (muddled), 1 dash Aromatic Bitters, 1 dash Cherry Bitters
Instructions: Muddle cherry in liquid ingredients. Shake, double strain over cracked ice. Garnish with two more cherries on a pick with an orange flag.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Fernet, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 2 oz Cola, 1 wedge Lemon juice
Instructions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice into a stemmed glass, stir well and serve.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pusser's Blue Label Rum , .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Ginger Syrup, .25 oz Lime Juice,  top Homemade Pink Grapefruit Soda
Instructions: Wet shake all ingredients except grapefruit soda, pour over ice and top with grapefruit soda. Rim glass with grapefruit demerara. Add dehydrated grapefruit wheel and slice of fresh root ginger for garnish.

Ingredients: 2 oz Westland American Single Malt, .25 oz Lustau Pedro Ximénez Sherry, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Fig & Cinnamon Syrup, 1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Shake and double strain into double rocks glass. Garnish with torched cinnamon stick and Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: .75 oz Rye Whiskey, .75 oz Green Chartreuse, .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice
Instructions: Shake until very cold; double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. No garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Junmai Sake, .25 oz Coconut Rum, 1 dash Orange Bitters, 1 dash Coconut Vinegar
Instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass. Stir until thoroughly chilled (~30 seconds). Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Serve with one big rock. Garnish with an expressed orange swath.

Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Creme de Cacao, 1 oz Cream (steamed as for a cappuccino)
Instructions:
Warm and flame H by Hine VSOP Fine Champagne in metal mug like a Blue Blazer without the tossing back and forth.
Douse flame of heated brandy with cacao, top with foamed cream.
Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Lustau Amontillado Sherry, 1 oz Bols Genever, .5 oz Orange Juice, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Luxardo Orgeat Syrup, 2 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

Ingredients: Kahlua,Sambuca,Blue Curacao,Bailey's irish cream
Instructions: Pour the Sambuca and Kahlua into the Cocktail Glass and give the drinker a straw. Pour the Baileys and Blue Curacao into two sepsrate shot glasses either side of the cocktail glass. Set light the concotion in the cocktail glass and start to drink through the straw (this drink should be drunk in one) , as the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the Baileys and Blue Curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it's all gone!!

Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, 1 oz Fresh Grapefruit Juice, .25 oz Simple Syrup, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 dash Chocolate Mole Bitters
Instructions: Shake and serve up. Garnish elaborately with a Luxardo Cherry and a grapefruit peel.

Ingredients: 30 ml Pink Pigeon Rum, 15 ml Dry Oloroso Sherry, 15 oz Grenadine, 1 whole Egg,   Vanilla-Salt Spray
Instructions: Dry shake, shake with cubed ice, double strain into chilled glass coated in vanilla-salt solution.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .75 oz Simple syrup, .75 oz Cream, .5 oz Punt e Mes, 1  Egg yolk
Instructions: Shake without ice, to whip and emulsify ingredients until frothy. Add ice to shaker and shake vigorously. Strain into port glass or small fluted glass. Garnish with shaved cinnamon or nutmeg.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Honey syrup , .75 oz Fresh lemon syrup ,   Tarragon leaves,   Lavender bitters
Instructions: Shake and strain into a martini glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Chinaco Reposado Tequila, 1 oz Lime Juice, .5 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Small Hand Foods Orgeat, .5 oz Falernum, 2 dash Mole Bitters
Instructions: Shake, strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with lime wheel.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Mezcal, .25 oz Luxardo Espresso Italian Liqueur, .75 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 2 dash Salted Chocolate Bitters
Instructions: Add all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir with ice. Strain into a Nick & Nora coupe. Garnish with a ghost orange twist.

Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 oz C. Drouin Pommeau de Normandie, .5 oz Fresh lemon juice, .5 oz Fresh orange juice, 1 dash Jerry Thomas Bitters
Instructions: Shake and serve up.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .75 oz Simple syrup, .75 oz Lime juice
Instructions: Shake with ice, strain into flute, top with sparkling rose and a grapefruit twist.

Ingredients: .75 oz No.3 London Dry Gin or H by HINE, .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 dash Simple Syrup, 1 float Sparkling Wine
Instructions: Mix the gin or cognac, lemon juice and syrup in a cocktail shaker. Pour the contents into a Champagne flute. Top up with Champagne. Add a Luxardo Cherry or a peel of lemon.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, 1 oz House Ginger Beer, .75 oz Lime juice, .75 oz Simple syrup, .25 oz John D. Taylor's Velvet Falernum, 3  Cucumber wheels, 8  Mint leaves, 1  Mint sprig
Instructions: Add the cucumber, mint and simple syrup to a mixing glass and muddle. Add everything else, then shake with ice and strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a mint sprig poking through a cucumber wheel.

Ingredients: Vodka,Raspberry Liqueur,pineapple juice
Instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO, .75 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), .25 oz Benedictine, 1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.

Ingredients: 1 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, 1 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .75 oz Pear Watercress Puree, .75 oz Lemon Juice
Instructions: Shaken and strained into a large coupe. Mint oil is house-made and used as a garnish.

Ingredients: Peach Vodka,Lemon juice,Galliano,Sirup of roses
Instructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italy.

Ingredients: 2 oz Garrison Brothers Flagship Bourbon, .5 oz Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, 2 dash Australian Bitters Company Aromatic Bitters,   Lemon Peel
Instructions: Place the lemon peel in an Old Fashioned glass and muddle with bitters. In a mixing glass filled with ice, add the bourbon and apricot liqueur, then strain into the glass. Garnish with cherry and orange slice, and serve over an ice sphere.

Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz Maurin Quina, .5 oz Fresh Lemon, .5 oz Pages Elderflower Syrup,  top Ginger Ale
Instructions: Shake all ingredients in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled serving glass. Top with a splash of ginger ale. Garnish with a cucumber slice, quartered.

Ingredients: 2.5 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, .25 oz Tippleman's Barrel Smoked Maple Syrup, 2 dash Regans' Orange Bitters, 5 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 disc Orange, 1 disc Lemon, 1 slice Peach
Instructions: Muddle fruit, bitters and syrup. Add ice (1 large cube if available). Top with Whisky. Long stir.

Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, 1 oz Vermouth del Professore, 2 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 dash St. George Absinthe
Instructions: Build all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice and stir. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with fresh fennel flowers.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Old Tom Gin, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Small Hand Foods Gum Syrup, 7 dash Celery Bitters, 1 oz Tonic Water, 1 pinch Salt
Instructions: Shake booze, juice and gum. Add bitters and salt to a double rocks glass then add ice. Strain cocktail, top with tonic. Garnish with bitter covered lemon peel.

Ingredients: Gin,Grenadine,lemon,Soda Water,Lime
Instructions: Half-fill a tall glass with ice. Mix the gin and Grenadine together and pour over the ice. Add the lime or lemon juice and top off with soda water. Decorate the glass with lime and/or lemon slices.

Ingredients: .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1.5 oz Momokawa Organic Junmai Ginjo Sake, .75 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Simple syrup
Instructions: Shake and strain up into cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 1 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz Luxardo Aperitivo, .5 oz Simple syrup, .5 oz Lemon juice, 1 float Ginger beer, 4 pieces Chopped pineapple, 3 pieces Ginger root
Instructions: Muddle pineapple and ginger root, lemon juice and simple syrup, then add Aperitivo and rum, shake well, over ice and top up with Ginger beer.

Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Grapefruit flavored Vodka, .5 oz Fresh lemon juice, 1 float Pomegranate liqueur, 2 scoop Lemon sorbet
Instructions: Pour the first four ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve into a champagne saucer. Top with Pomegranate Liqueur float.

Ingredients: 1 oz Old Potrero Straight Rye Whiskey, .5 oz Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, .33 oz Luxardo Fernet, .75 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Homemade orgeat, 4 dash Angostura bitters, 3 dash Fee Bros Orange bitters
Instructions: In a collins glass, add ingredients beginning with orgeat and ending with rye. Fill glass half full with minted crushed ice. Begin "swizzling" cocktail with stick until cocktail is blended and ice forms on outside of glass. Top with more minted crushed ice and garnish with lemon and mint.

Ingredients: 3  Basil Leaves, 1.5 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, .75 oz Pineapple Juice, .5 oz Simple Syrup, .5 oz Sweet Vermouth, .5 oz Lime Juice , .5 oz Egg White, 1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Put basil leaves in mixing glass. Gently muddle the leaves. Add all ingredients except the bitters or ice. Dry shake the cocktail vigorously. Add the ice and shake again vigorously. Double strain into a coupe. Add a few drops of angostura on top, add cracked pepper, slap one single basil leaf on top for garnish.

Ingredients: 1 oz Cocchi Americano, 1 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 2 oz Club Soda
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a glass filled with ice and garnish with an orange twist.

Ingredients: .75 oz Tempus Fugit Gran Classico Bitter, .75 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso
Instructions: Strain into an ice filled glass and garnish with an orange twist.

Ingredients: 750 ml bottle Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 5 sprigs Dill, 2 cloves Crushed Garlic, 1  Lemon Peel (white pith removed and julienned), 1 Tbsp Whole Peppercorns
Instructions:
Step one: Infuse the vodka
- Transfer ingredients including 750 ml of Karlsson's vodka to a canning jar or glass container. Close the container.
- Shake and rotate every few hours. Let infuse for 24 hours total.
- After 24 hours, strain the vodka through a cheesecloth or nutmilk bag.
- Transfer the vodka to a glass bottle. Store in the refrigerator or freezer until use.

Step two: Make the martini
- Stir 2-3 oz, depending on preference, of the infused vodka with ice.
- Strain into a chilled martini glass.
- Add pickled onions and peppers.

Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, .75 oz Lime Juice, .5 oz St. Germaine Elderflower Liqueur, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 5 drops Bittercube Door County Hop Bitters
Instructions: Shake, strain, up, garnish.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Cherry Syrup (from jar of cherries), .25 oz Fresh Lemon Juice (optional), 6 oz Soda Water
Instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, and build the syrup, lemon juice, and soda water. Stir, and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1.5 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, 2 dash Luxardo Fernet
Instructions: Shake ingredients with ice then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, 8 oz Apple Cider,  oz Heavy Cream,  oz Cinnamon
Instructions: Fill a 10-oz mug with boiling water. When the mug is hot, pour out the water and add the amaretto and cider. Top with a layer of cream. Grate fresh cinnamon on top as a garnish.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1.25 oz Blanco Tequila, .25 oz D.O.M Benedictine, 1 dash Bittermens Xocolatl Mole Bitters
Instructions: Pour all liquid ingredients into a mixing glass and stir about 55 times for proper dilution and optimal clarity. Strain into a chilled coupe. Twist fresh lemon peel over cocktail for aroma. Garnish with a simple lemon peel, trimmed neatly.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Graham's 20 Year Tawny Port, .5 oz Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or, .33 oz Velvet Falernum, .25 oz Benedictine
Instructions: Combine all ingredients and stir. Pour the mixture into a chilled Nick & Nora glass and garnish with the orange zest.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Bonded Rye, .5 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .5 oz Punt e Mes, 7 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir to chill and dilute. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Express the oil from the twist over the drink and discard.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .75 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .5 oz Fresh Grapefruit Juice, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
Instructions: Shake with ice in a mixing tin and double strain into a chilled cocktail coupe. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.

Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, .75 oz Lime juice, .75 oz Hibiscus/rose syrup, 1  Egg white
Instructions: Dry shake, add ice and shake again. Strain into a coupe glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whiskey, .75 oz Luxardo Bitter, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, 2 dash Chocolate Bitters
Instructions: Chilled. Serve up or on the rocks.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Hophead Vodka, .75 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Lime Juice, .5 oz Cranberry Juice
Instructions: Shake, fine strain into chilled coupe. Garnish with lime wheel.

Ingredients: 1 oz Genever, 1 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Dry Vermouth, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Pineapple Gomme Syrup
Instructions: Shake. Serve up. Garnish with lemon peel/pineapple.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz English Harbour Rum 5 YO, .25 oz Honey, 3  Lime Wedges, 4  Basil Leaves,  top Ginger Ale
Instructions: In collins glass, gently muddle honey, lime and basil leaves. Add English Harbour rum and ice and stir. Top with ginger ale.

Ingredients: 4 oz Hophead Vodka, .5 oz Olive Juice, 1 dash Dry Vermouth
Instructions: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an olive.

Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, .25 oz Simple syrup, 2 dash Angostura bitters, 1 dash Fee Brothers Gin Barrel Aged Bitters
Instructions: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and stir until proper dilution. Strain into a chilled bucket glass over a large ice cube and garnish with a dukes lemon and dukes grapefruit zest.

Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, 6 oz Tomato Juice, 1.5 tsp Demitri's Bloody Mary Seasoning, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a chilled mixing glass, rimmed with sea salt and stir. Add ice. Stir again to mix. Garnish with a cocktail shrimp, lemon zest, fresh ground pepper and a celery stalk.

Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Lime Juice,  top Ginger Beer
Instructions: Combine Hophead Vodka, Kings Ginger, and lime juice in a Collins glass and fill with ice. Top with ginger beer. Stir. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Ingredients: 1 oz Genevieve Gin, 1 bottle Lager
Instructions: Genevieve is Hotaling's interpretation of genever, an ancient and mysterious gin style. The most common way to consume genever has always been straight. If you are planning to set sail for the day, picnic or do something else to enjoy the great outdoors, we recommend throwing a bottle of Genevieve in the freezer the evening before your outing and moving it to the cooler day of. We sip it straight while enjoying a lager. Glassware is dealer's choice, but cordial glasses are elegant and fun.

Ingredients: 2 oz Christmas Spirit, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco, .25 oz Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), 1 dash Fee Brother's Orange Bitters
Instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and stir with ice. Strain and serve up with an orange twist.

Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 1 cube Brown Sugar
Instructions: Soak brown sugar cube in Angostura and Orange bitters. Muddle soaked sugar cube into a paste in a rocks glass. Pour 2 oz. Pink Pigeon. Add ice and stir. Garnish with an orange peel and Luxardo Cherry.

Cocktail Name: I'm Only Happy when it Rains
Ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Old Potrero Straight Rye Whiskey, 3/4 oz Hirsh Pinot Noir Reduction, 1/4 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 3/4 oz Lemon Juice
Instructions: Shake, double strain into a Burgundy Glass.

Ingredients: Lime juice,Gin,Aperol
Instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 2 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, 1 bsp Benedictine, 1 bsp Green Chartreuse, 1 bsp Small Hand Foods Gum Syrup, 2 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Stir to 35 °F, strain into a double rocks glass over an angled ice wedge. Garnish with orange peel.

Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO, 1 dash Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 dash Pontarlier Anis
Instructions: Stir and strain into a chilled coupe.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, 1 oz Luxardo Bitter, .5 oz Quady Muscat Wine
Instructions: Stir and strain into an old fashioned glass. Large ice cube.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Amaro Nonino Quintessentia, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Mezcal, .5 oz Small Hand Foods Orgeat, 2 oz Soda Water
Instructions: Stir, fine strain into a collins glass over ice. Top with soda. Garnish with grapefruit peel.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Hophead Vodka, .5 oz Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Lime Juice, .5 oz Pure Cane Simple Syrup, 2 count Deschutes Fresh Squeezed IPA (from tap)
Instructions: Add all ingredients except beer into shaker tin, shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Add beer in shaker tin then double strain into tin cup. Add mint for garish.

Ingredients: Bailey's irish cream,Bourbon,Vodka,Orange juice
Instructions: Pour Irish Cream, Vodka, and Bourbon in a glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, .25 oz Absinthe, 4 oz Hot coffee, 2-3 oz Homemade Irish Cream
Instructions: Combine the coffee and whiskey in a preheated cup. Top with Irish cream and pour the absinthe over the back of a spoon to float. Garnish.

Cocktail Name: Iron Fist in a Velvet Glove
Ingredients: 1.25 oz Lillet Rose, .75 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, .75 oz Prata Cachaca, .25 oz Velvet Falernum
Instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.

Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Genepy, .75 oz Luxardo Fernet, .75 oz Lime Juice, 1 float Tonic Water
Instructions: Shake, strain into a chilled coupe, float tonic water.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Maestro Dobel Diamante Tequila, .5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, 1 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .25 oz Monin Cane Syrup
Instructions: Shaken and served over ice.

Ingredients: 1 oz Coconut Rum, .5 oz Funkin Passion Fruit Puree, .5 oz Briottet Creme de Banane, .5 oz Fresh squeezed lime, 8 leaves Mint Leaves
Instructions: Shake & Dump into Collins Glass, Top with Prosecco, cap with crushed ice. Garnish with Mint Sprig.

Instructions:
dryshake/shake/dblrocks

garnish jalapeño slice

Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Tempus Fugit Creme de Noyaux, .5 oz Orgeat, .375 oz Lemon, .375 oz Lime, 1 oz Heavy Whipping Cream, 1  Egg White
Instructions: Combine all ingredients and shake thoroughly without ice for several minutes. Add ice, shake, and strain into a tall collins glass. Top with soda and garnish with an orange wheel.

Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Luxardo Orgeat Syrup, 3 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Fill a mixing glass half full with ice. Add cognac, orgeat, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over the drink and drop in as a garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 oz Orange juice, 1 dash Simple syrup, 2  Cucumber slices, muddled, 2  Raspberries, muddled
Instructions: Muddle two cucumber slices, two raspberries and simple syrup in a highball, add ice. Shake gin, ginger liqueur and orange juice with ice. Strain into highball glass.  Garnish with a candied ginger stick.

Ingredients: Gin,Vodka,Grenadine,Lime juice,Sugar,Sugar syrup,Soda water
Instructions: Wet glass, dip rim in sugar. Then add Ice. Then add everything else. It's that simple!

Ingredients: 1 oz Broker's Gin, 1 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 2 oz Celery Root Puree, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .75 oz Simple Syrup, 3 dash Apple Bitters, 1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker and shake with ice, then double strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a celery leaf.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Simple Syrup, .5 oz Lime Juice, .25 oz Pomegranate Syrup, 4 large Mint Leaves
Instructions: In mixing glass, using a spoon, crush 2 mint leaves in the simple syrup, and add gin, lime juice and pomegranate syrup. Pour into ice-filled shaker. Shake well and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Float remaining 2 mint leaves for garnish.

Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, .75 oz Dry Vermouth, .25 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, 1 bsp Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions:
Stir all ingredients until well chilled, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange peel with oils squeeze over cocktail.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, .25 oz Lime juice , 3 oz Ginger beer
Instructions: Add vodka and lime juice to drinking glass, add ice, and top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime.

Ingredients: 2 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 1 cube Brown sugar, 1 splash Bitter
Instructions:
Put a brown sugar cube at the bottom of a frosted glass.
Add a splash of bitter and muddle the sugar.
Add Karlsson's Gold Vodka and stir with ice.
Add lemon and orange peels (which you can burn for added flavor).

Ingredients: 750 ml bottle Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 5 oz Pomegranate Juice, 9 oz Cranberry Juice, 9 oz Aperol, 4 oz Simple Syrup (equal parts sugar and water), 3  Star Anise, 5  Cloves, 4  Allspice Berries, 3  Cinnamon Sticks, 2 oz Orange Peel
Instructions: Toast spices and set aside. Bring cranberry juice to a simmer. Tie the spices and orange peel in cheesecloth and add them to the cranberry juice. Let this simmer for about 30 minutes. Remove the spice sachet and add the other liquid ingredients. Serve warm or chilled with orange wheels as a garnish. (The magic of punches is that you can adjust them to your liking as you make them, so please play around with different juices and proportions.)

Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Supremo Moste Verde Italia Pisco, .5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Lemon juice, 2 dash Angostura Orange Bitters
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino cherry.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, 1 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, 2 dash Orange Bitters, 1 splash Club Soda
Instructions: Pour the ingredients in an old fashioned glass, then fill up with ice and stir well before serving.

Ingredients: 1 oz Mezcal, 1 oz Bourbon, .5 oz Lemon, .5 oz Peche de Vigne, .5 oz Cynar, .5 oz Orgeat, 4 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Shake, strain over crushed ice in a highball. Garnish with a mint sprig and a cherry.

Ingredients: oz Pink Pigeon Rum,  oz St. Germaine Elderflower Liqueur,  oz Lemon ,  oz Vanilla Syrup,  oz Prosecco
Instructions: Build and serve in a champagne flute.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Wild Turkey 101 Rye, .5 oz Bin 27 Port, .25 oz Yellow Chartreuse, 2 dash Mole Bitters
Instructions: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into Canadian Glencairn glass.

Instructions: Shake, strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with lemon twist.

Instructions: Add all ingredients except the whip cream and ginger snap. Shake and double into a rocks glass with no ice. Top with marshmallow whip cream. Garnish with Ginger snap crumbles.

Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Clover Honey Syrup
Instructions: Combine ingredients into a hot mug, top with hot water and garnish with a rough orange twist.

Ingredients: 1 part Briottet Creme de Cassis, 4 part Chilled Dry White Wine
Instructions: Add room temperature Creme de Cassis to the glass first, followed by the wine.

Ingredients: 1 part Briottet Creme de Cassis, 4 part Chilled Dry Champagne
Instructions: Add room temperature Creme de Cassis to the glass first, followed by the Champagne.

Ingredients: 2 oz Gin, .75 oz Sweet Vermouth, .75 oz Dubonnet Rouge, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
Instructions: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an apple slice.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 oz Honey-Pear Liqueur, .5 oz Heavy Cream,  oz Pinch of Cardamom,  oz Dehydrated pear slice
Instructions: Pre-mix the liquors together and keep refrigerated. Serve 2 oz. neat into a small coupe glass. Float the fresh cream on top.

Ingredients: 2 oz English Harbour Rum, .5 oz Briottet Creme de Banane, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Lime juice, 1 bsp Rich simple syrup
Instructions: Shake and strain into small cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), 1 oz Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Classica, .5 oz Luxardo Sour Cherry Syrup (Previously Amarena), 5  Kumquats, 1 float Mango Flavored Rum
Instructions: Muddle the fruit with syrup in a mixing glass. Add ice and shake vigorously. Pour all ingredients(do not strain) in a tumbler glass. Add a float of Mango flavored Rum.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, .75 oz Esprit de June, .5 oz Fresh lemon juice, .5 oz Simple syrup
Instructions:
Combine all liquid ingredients in a highball or Collins glass with ice.
Stir lightly and garnish with a lemon twist making sure to release all the essential oils out of the twist. Also make sure to rub the entire rim of the glass with the twist before dropping it into the cocktail.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 0.5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 0.5 oz Tempus Fugit Liqueur de Violettes, .75 oz Fresh lemon juice
Instructions: Place ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake hard for seven seconds. Double strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with lemon peel.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Mezcal, .75 oz Pierre Ferrand Curaçao, .5 oz Gordy’s Cocktail Pickle Brine, 1 oz Watermelon Juice, .5 oz Fresh Grapefruit Juice, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice
Instructions:
Pour ingredients in a shaker tin, add ice and shake well. 

Fine strain the drink into a double rocks glass filled with ice.
 
Balance a small watermelon triangle on top of the glass. Grate fresh lime zest on top using a microplane, and then sprinkle with Maldon salt.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, 2 oz Fever-Tree Indian Tonic, 1 dash Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
Instructions: Build spirits in a tall glass over clear ice. Top with 4 oz tonic and garnish with a lemon twist curled into a flower if you're feeling fancy.

Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .75 oz Fresh Grapefruit Juice, .5 oz Simple Syrup,   Gin Barrel Aged Orange Bitters,   Fresh Basil Leaves
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake until proper dilution. Double strain into a chilled martini or coupe glass and garnish with 2 fresh basil leaves that have been lightly "spanked" to release aromatics.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, .5 oz Aperol, .5 oz Raspberry/white pepper syrup, .5 oz Fresh lemon juice, .5 oz Fresh cucumber juice, 4-5 pc Fresh mint, 2 dashes Celery bitters
Instructions: In a mixing glass muddle mint, add all other ingredients and ice, shake, fine strain into a double old fashioned glass over fresh cracked ice. Garnish with cucumber slices and raspberries.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), .5 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and add ice. Shake well and double strain and serve into a coupe.

Ingredients: 2 oz Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial, 1.5 oz Fresh Passion Fruit, 1 oz Condense Milk, .25 oz Brown Sugar Syrup (2:1)
Instructions: Add all ingredients to blender and blend throughly. Double strain into a glass with cracked ice garnish with a mint sprig and fresh grated nutmeg.

Ingredients: 2 oz Chinaco Anejo Tequila, .25 oz Mezcal, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 2 drops Agave Nectar, 3 dash Fee Brothers Aztec Chocolate Bitters, 2 cubes Sugar
Instructions:
In rocks glass, make an emulsion by using a glass muddler (wood muddlers absorb the ingredients too much). Place sugar cubes in glass. Add mezcal onto the cubes. Add bitters, onto cubes. Add drops of agave nectar, onto cubes. Add Luxardo, onto cubes. Muddle well to make a "syrup" paying attention the blending of all ingredients. 
Take the long orange peel and twist all the essential oils into glass. Leave peel in glass. 
Place Gläce Luxury Ice G-Cubed in glass. Rotate Gläce G-Cubed so that it becomes coated and chills the "syrup" swirl around the inside of glass. Pour the Anejo Tequila over Gläce G-Cubed. Stir with glass swizzle. Garnish with 3 Luxardo Cherries, speared.

Ingredients: 1 oz Vodka, 1 oz Gin, 1 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Cointreau
Instructions: Shake. Serve up. Garnish with lime wheel.

Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Green Chartreuse, .75 oz Fresh Lime Juice
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO, .25 oz Rich Cane Syrup, 2 dash Bittermens Xocolatl Mole Bitters, 2 dash Cinnamon Bitters

Add ice and shake vigorously. Pour in a tall glass over ice, top with ginger beer.  Garnish with the passion fruit wedge to serve.

Ingredients: 1 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 1 oz Cognac, .5 oz Benedictine, 1 tincture Angostura Bitters, 1 tincture Peychaud's Bitters, 1 pc Lemon Twist, 1 pc Orange Twist,   Peanut Butter Powder
Instructions: Wet half of the rim of a 13 oz. rocks glass with Benedictine. Shake off the excess Benedictine to avoid clumping on the rim and dip it into the peanut butter powder. Flick the glass to shake the excess powder off. Place the glass in a cooler to chill the glass. In a frozen mixing glass combine all liquid ingredients with equal parts cracked ice and whole hard ice. Stir the cocktail for 45 seconds. Remove the glass from the cooler and place a 2 in. hard ice cube in it. Double strain the cocktail into the glass. Spritz the cocktail with both of the twists. Make sure to release all the essential oils into the cocktail. Discard the twists.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz New York Apple Whiskey, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Lemon, .5 oz Lemongrass ginger syrup, .5 oz Egg white
Instructions: Muddled ginger root. Shaken, served up, cinnamon stick and apple to garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .5 oz Simple Syrup, .5 oz Fresh Grapefruit Juice
Instructions: Add all ingredients into shaking tin. Add ice cubes to tin. Shake vigorously and strain into coupe. Garnish with Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.

Ingredients: 3 oz Peach Juice, 1 1/2 oz Condensed milk, 1 1/2 oz Ypiòca , 1 Tbsp Sugar
Instructions: Put 3 ounces of peach juice, 1 1/2 ounces of Ypiòca, 1 1/2 ounces of condensed milk and 1 tablespoon of sugar in a shaker. Add ice cubes, shake well and serve.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Old Forester Bourbon, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne, .5 oz Honey syrup (local honey cut 2:1 with water), .75 oz Lemon juice, 1  Egg white, 1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Combine all ingredients except the bitters and dry shake. Add ice and shake again. Strain over fresh ice into a double old fashioned glass. Dash bitters over the top of the cocktail. Garnish with a dried peach and a piece of candied ginger.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 oz Rothman & Winter Orchard Pear Liqueur, .75 oz Cranberry Juice, 1 tincture Fee Brothers Cranberry Bitters, 10  Fresh Cranberries
Instructions: In a Boston shaker combine and muddle the fresh lemon juice and cranberries. Add the remaining liquid ingredients except the club soda with hard ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds pour directly into a highball add a little more ice to fill the glass and top with the club soda. Garnish with a few pear slices and fresh cranberries.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Pisco, .75 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
Instructions: Stir ingredients in a mixing glass over an ice sphere(if available) then strain and serve into a chilled cocktail glass filled with the same ice sphere. Garnish with lemon balm and grapefruit peel.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Orange Liquor, 1.5 oz House-made Spiced Pumpkin Puree, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Ginger Syrup, 1  Egg White,  top Apple Cider
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker, except the apple cider. Shake vigorously. Strain over ice. Top with apple cider. Garnish with shaved cinnamon and nutmeg.

Ingredients: 2 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 1 oz Nigori sake (Unfiltered), .5 oz Fresh Shibori Yuzu juice, .5 oz Simple syrup (2:1 sugar water), .5 pc Thai chili, 4-5 sprigs Fresh cilantro (stems on)
Instructions:
In the small tin of a Boston shaker set, combine the cilantro sprigs, thai chili, yuzu juice, simple syrup and a small piece of ice. Muddle these ingredients well. Add the remaining liquid ingredients to the shaker with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds. 
Double strain the cocktail over ice into a 13 oz. rocks glass. 
Garnish with the Thai chili piece and the cilantro sprig.

Ingredients: 2 oz English Harbour Rum, .75 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 whole Egg
Instructions: Shake vigorously. Strain into highball glass. Top with Ale. Grated nutmeg.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Pimms, 1 bsp Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, 1 oz Fresh lime juice, .75 oz Simple syrup, 5 leaves Basil leaves
Instructions: Combine ingredients into a mixing glass, add ice and shake until properly diluted. Double strain into a glass over fresh ice, garnish with a cucumber wheel.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Mezcal, .75 oz Montenegro Amaro Liquore Italiano, .75 oz Calisaya Liqueur, 2 dash Regans' Orange Bitters No. 6
Instructions: Stir and garnish lemon peel.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, 4  Lime wedges, 1  Pinapple wheel, .5 oz Gomme syrup, 1 float Pisco
Instructions: Place the lime wedges and pinapple in a tumbler glass with gomme syrup and muddle briskly, then add ice and Amaretto. Stir well and serve with a float of Pisco.

Ingredients: 1 oz Charbay Ruby Red Grapefruit Vodka, 1 oz Vya Dry Vermouth, .75 oz Hophead Vodka, .25 oz Small Hand Foods Pineapple Gum Syrup
Instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.

Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 3 oz Coca-Cola, .5 oz Lime Juice
Instructions: Combine the Pink Pigeon, the cola, and the lime juice, in a tall Collins glass full of ice cubes.

Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 3 oz Ginger Beer, .5 oz Lime Juice
Instructions: Combine the Pink Pigeon, the ginger beer, and the lime juice, in a tall Collins glass full of ice cubes.

Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 2 oz Pineapple Juice, 1.5 oz Cream of Coconut
Instructions: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail or Collins glass.

Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .25 oz Simple syrup, 2 oz Cranberry juice, 1 fill Club soda,   Mint leaves, 1 whole Lime, juiced
Instructions: To make simple syrup, mix equal parts hot water and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Place mint in bottom of glass. Add ice and remaining ingredients except club soda then stir. Top with club soda and garnish with a mint sprig.

Ingredients: 7 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 1 oz Agave Syrup, 7 oz Watermelon, 2  Lemon Juice,  top Ginger Beer
Instructions: Build in a large pitcher or punchbowl. Combine Pink Pigeon Rum, juice from 2 lemons and agave. Blend 7 oz. of fresh watermelon in a blender and puree to mixture. Add a generous amount of ice and stir. Top with ginger beer. Ladle or pour into coupe glasses.

Ingredients: 3 c Pink Pigeon Rum, 3 c Orange Juice, 3 c Pineapple Juice, 3 c Ginger Ale, .25 c Grenadine, 1  Fresh-Squeezed Lime Juice
Instructions: Mix all ingredients in a large pitcher, add ice, and enjoy!

Ingredients: 1 cube Brown Sugar, soaked in Peychaud's Bitters, .75 oz Pink Pigeon Rum,  fill Champagne
Instructions: Brown sugar cube soaked in Peychaud’s Bitters. Put soaked sugar cube in glass first. Pour .75 oz Pink Pigeon rum into flute over sugar cube. Fill remainder of the glass with champagne. Garnish with lemon twist.

Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, 2 oz Pineapple Juice, 1 oz Fresh Lime Juice, 1 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Add all liquid ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into an ice filled white wine glass. Garnish by adding pineapple chunks and Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, 1 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Small Hand Foods Pineapple Gum Syrup, .5 oz Falernum
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a coupe glass. Nutmeg on top for garnish.

Cocktail Name: Pisco Punch (Adaptation by The Comstock Saloon)
Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, .75 oz Small Hand Foods Pineapple Gum Syrup, .75 oz Lemon Juice, 3 dash Kaffir Tincture
Instructions: Shake, strain into a chilled flip glass with one cube. Garnish with lemon peel.

Ingredients: Pisco,Lemon juice,Sugar,Ice
Instructions: Vigorously shake and strain contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then pour into glass and garnish with bitters.[1]

Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, 1 oz Fresh lime juice, 1 oz Simple syrup, .5 oz Egg white, 3 dash Angostura bitters
Instructions: First, dry shake all ingredients. Then, shake all ingredients vigorous with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with 2-3 drops of Angostura bitters on top of the foam.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, 1 oz Aged Rum, 1 oz Fresh cream(not whipped), .5 oz Pistachio syrup
Instructions: Shake ingredients with ice then strain into a cocktail glass previously swirled with chocolate syrup and rimmed with ground pistachios.

Ingredients: .5 oz H by HINE, .5 oz El Dorado 12 Year Old Rum, .5 oz Hamilton Black Jamaican Pot Still Rum, .5 oz Cinnamon Syrup, .5 oz Heavy Cream, 1 tsp St. Elizabeth Allspice Dram, 1 whole Egg,  top Founders Porter
Instructions: Dry shake, strain, top with porter.

Ingredients: 2 oz Mezcal, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Chinato, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Gran Classico Bitter, 2 dash Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters
Instructions: Stir over 1 large rock. Garnish with zest of an orange peel.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz House-made Slivovitz (Plum Brandy), 1 oz Chamomile Tea-Infused Noilly Prat Dry Vermouth, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 3 dash Peychaud's Bitters
Instructions: Stir and strain. Hoshizaki ice.

Ingredients: 1.25 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .5 oz The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Blue, .25 oz Pages Elderflower Syrup
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with lots of ice. Strain into serving glass. Top off with a splash of club soda.

Ingredients: 2 part Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial, .5 part Lillet Rose, .5 part Guava Nectar, .25 part Fresh Lime Juice, .25 part Agave,  top Banfi Rosa Regale Sparkling Wine
Instructions:
For punch, combine Ypioca, Lillet Rose, guava nectar, lime and agave. Top with Rosa Regale sparkling and add sliced strawberries and thin-sliced lime wheels to float as garnish.

For individual cocktails, muddle 2-3 strawberry slices w/ agave and add Ypioca, guava and Lillet. Add ice and shake to chill/mix. Strain over ice and top with champagne. Garnish with thin-sliced strawberry. Remember, this is an aperitif style so it's meant to be refreshing but not necessarily sweet.

Ingredients: 2 oz Chinaco Blanco Tequila, 1 oz Lime Juice, .5 oz Prickly Pear Puree, .5 oz Agave
Instructions: Mint salt on the rim. Garnish with mint sprig.

Ingredients: 45 ml Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 15 ml Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), 20 ml Luxardo Liquore St. Antonio
Instructions: Shake and strain into a martini glass, spray some absinthe on the glass.

Ingredients: 2 oz Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, .75 oz Luxardo Bitter, .5 oz Cold Blue Bottle Coffee, .25 oz Luxardo Anisette, 2 dash Peychaud's Bitters
Instructions: Build in collins glass. Top with soda. Orange peel.

Ingredients: 1.25 oz Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, 1.25 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .5 oz Chocolate Liqueur, 1 oz Heavy cream flavored with Hum Liqueur
Instructions: Pour the liquor ingredients over ice and top with half inch (about one centimeter) layer of lightly whipped cream shaken with Hum Liqueur.

Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Toasted Pecan Syrup, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Cynar, 1 bsp Spiced Pumpkin Butter, 2 dash Cinnamon Tincture
Instructions: Shake. Double strain. King cube. Orange peel garnish

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Reisetbauer Carrot Eau De Vie, .75 oz Genevieve Gin
Instructions: Combine ingredients in mixing glass, and stir with ice to dilution. Strain into a coupe cocktail glass. Garnish with a trimmed carrot ribbon.
