Instructions: Place all ingredients in a mixing tin, muddle fresh raspberries, add ice and shake until tin is frosty. Strain into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with orange wedge.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .75 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .5 oz Dry Vermouth, .25 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, 1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Pour into shaker over ice and shake well. Serve straight up in a martini glass with an orange twist.

Ingredients: .75 oz Bols Genever, .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Absinthe, .75 oz Lime Juice
Instructions: Shake with ice, strain and pour into a chilled martini glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Chinaco Blanco Tequila, .25 oz F. Meyer Mirabelle (Yellow Plum), .5 oz Fino Sherry, .75 oz The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Blue, 2 oz Horchata, .5 oz Simple Syrup (2:1), .5 oz Lime Juice
Instructions: Blend with ice.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Chinaco Blanco Tequila, 1 oz Wild Hibiscus Tea, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .5 oz Agave Nectar,   Strawberries,  top Sparkling Water
Instructions: Muddle strawberries in a shaker with agave nectar, add lime juice, hibiscus tea, and Chinaco Blanco. Top with sparkling water.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Classica, 1.5 oz Ginger Citrus Agave Blend, 5 oz Ginger Ale, 1 dash Aromatic Bitters
Instructions: Pour ingredients into mug, fill with ice. top with ginger ale. Roll into tin. Roll back into mug. Garnish.

Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO, .5 oz 15 YO Sherry, 2 dashes Dr. Adam's Boker's bitters, .25 oz Simple syrup
Instructions: Build in old fashioned glass, stir and serve over large ice cube.

Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO, .5 oz 15 YO Sherry, 2 dash Dr. Adam's Boker's bitters, .25 oz Simple syrup
Instructions: Serve in an old fashioned glass over a large ice cube.

Ingredients: .75 oz Cognac, .5 oz Cointreau, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .25 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 3 oz Champagne
Instructions: Add all ingredients except the champagne to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a martini glass. Fill with champagne and garnish with a flamed orange peel.

Ingredients: 2 oz White Rum, 1.75 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 1 oz Coconut Milk, 1 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .5 tsp Demerara Sugar, 10 dash Miracle Mile Forbidden Barrel Aged Bitters, 3  Roasted Cherries, 1 oz Black Rum, 1 tsp Everclear
Instructions: In a blender, combine white rum, Luxardo, coconut milk, lime juice, sugar, bitters, 3 cherries, and 1 cup ice and purée until smooth; pour into a tiki glass and top with black rum. Place halved cherry, cut-side up, on top of cocktail and fill with Everclear before lighting cherry on fire.

Ingredients: 2 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka (Root-Infused), .5 oz Cardamaro, .5 oz Fresh lemon juice, .5 oz Grade-A dark maple syrup, 1.5 oz Fenteman's ginger beer, 4 inch Whole licorice root
Instructions: In a Boston shaker combine all liquid ingredients except the ginger beer with whole hard ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Double strain the cocktail over whole hard ice cubes in a 13 oz. rocks glass and top with the ginger beer. Garnish with the licorice root.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .75 oz Honey Syrup (1:1 honey & water), 1 oz Pomegranate Juice, 3 oz Rose Wine,   Cinnamon, grated,   Nutmeg, grated,   Cherries,   Strawberries,   Watermelon, cube
Instructions:
Combine all ingredients in a wine glass, stir to mix. Add ice and enjoy.  
Convert ounces to cups to make a larger pitcher for you and your guests.

Ingredients: 2 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve,   Simple Syrup, 5  Mint Leaves
Instructions: Pour ingredients into cocktail shaker and shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over crushed ice with a mint sprig garnish.

Ingredients: 2 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, 3 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Aperitivo, .5 oz Round Pond Blood Orange Syrup, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 splash Sparkling Wine
Instructions: Combine all ingredients except soda in a shaker with ice, shake to combine. Pour into a coupe glass and garnish with a lemon peel.

Ingredients: Gin,Cranberry juice,Grenadine
Instructions: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Christmas Spirit, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Rose, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Gran Classico Bitter
Instructions: Combine all ingredients and stir with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into coupe glass and garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: 2 oz Breck Bourbon, .5 oz Dancing Pines Black Walnut Bourbon, .5 oz Punt e Mes, .25 oz King's Ginger Liqueur
Instructions: Muddle sage and Thyme. Stirred, over ice in single rocks glass. Burnt orange, and thyme sprig to garnish.

Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Cocchi Americano, .75 oz Dolin Rouge Vermouth, 1 dash Bittermens Hopped Grapefruit Bitters
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Apricot Eau-de-Vie, .25 oz Grenadine, 2 dash Lemon Bitters, 2 dash Absinthe
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice and then stir. Strain into a Nick & Nora glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Ingredients: 2 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 2 oz Fresh grapefruit juice, 1 oz Club soda, 1 tincture Grapefruit bitters
Instructions: Combine the Karlsson's Gold Vodka and grapefruit in a shaker with ice. Shake for 15 seconds and strain over fresh ice in an old-fashioned glass that has a salted rim. Top the cocktail with the club soda.

Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 3 oz Breckle's Brown Ale, 1 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .5 oz Honey Syrup, .5 oz Egg White, 2 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Combine Hophead, lemon juice, King's Ginger, honey syrup, egg white, and bitters in a shaker and dry shake to emulsify egg whites. Add ice and shake vigorously until proper dilution. Strain into a chilled fizz glass. Empty ice out of shakers and fill shaker with ale to create a froth. Pour this froth over the drink and garnish with half an orange wheel.

Ingredients: 1.25 oz Hophead Vodka, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice,  splash Soda Water,  top Steam Beer
Instructions: Pour over ice in a pint glass, then fill with steam beer. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a straw.

Ingredients: 1 oz Blanco Tequila, .5 oz Dry Curacao, .5 oz Luxardo Bitter, .75 oz Fresh Ruby Red Grapefruit Juice , .5 oz Cinnamon Syrup
Instructions: Shake all ingredients very well with ice and strain over ice into a highball glass.

Ingredients: 0.5 oz Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure, 2 oz H by HINE, 3 dash Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters, 0.5 tsp Sugar
Instructions:
Rinse entire glass with absinthe, discard, if you must.
Stir with ice and strain into an old-fashion glass, garnish with lemon peel.

Ingredients: 2 oz Ardbeg Ten, .75 oz Luxardo Aperitivo, .5 oz The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Orange, 5 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: Stir, strain into a chilled Nick and Nora glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .5 oz Lemon juice, .25 oz Simple syrup, .5 oz Egg white, 1 dash Fee Bros Rhubarb bitters
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in shaker. Dry shake for 10 seconds, add ice and shake for 30 seconds. Strain into small tumbler. Garnish with a sprinkle of grated nutmeg.

Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1.5 oz Seersucker Gin, .5 oz Lillet Blanc, 1.5 oz Sauternes, 2 dash Orange Blossom Water
Instructions: Rinse the glass with Orange Blossom Water and pour cocktail. Shake Egg White, Sauternes and Lemon Juice vigorously dry for 25 seconds, then add ice, gin, Luxardo Bitter Bianco and Lillet Blanc, shake again for 10 seconds. Strain into Nick & Nora, garnish with a lemon wheel.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Barr Hill Gin, .75 oz Falernum, 1 oz Topo Chico Mineral Water, 1 dash Lemon Bitters
Instructions: Combine ingredients in a pint glass, stir with ice to chill. Double strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with mint and lemon wedge flag.

Ingredients: Lemonade,Water,Vodka
Instructions: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

Ingredients: 5 oz Bacardi Superior Rum, 4 oz Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Blanc, 3.5 oz Lemon Juice, 3.5 oz Velvet Falernum
Instructions: Build all ingredients in a punch bowl and add ice, stir gently. Garnish with seasonal fruit and citrus wheels.

Ingredients: 2 oz Avuá Prata Cachaça, 2 oz Bacardi Superior Rum, 3 oz Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Rose, 2 oz Lime Juice, 1 oz Cannella Cinnamon Cordial, 2 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Build & Stir. Hoshizaki Ice.

Ingredients: 2 oz HINE Rare VSOP, .75 oz Mathilde Orange XO Liqueur, .75 oz Lemon Juice, 1 tsp Demerara Syrup (2:1)
Instructions: Shake. Strain into a coupe. Garnish with a lime twist.

Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Apple Brandy, .25 oz Benedictine, .25 oz Yellow Chartreuse, 1 dash Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure, 1 dash Peychaud's Bitters
Instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine)
Instructions: Pour Perfecto Amor over ice and garnish with an orange wheel.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .25 oz Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), .25 oz Luxardo Fernet, 3 oz Pineapple Juice, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, 2 dash Bitters
Instructions: Shake ingredients with ice then strain into an ice-filled collins or pilsner glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, .75 oz Spirit Works Sloe Gin, .5 oz Bonal, 4 drops Black Salt Tincture
Instructions: Stir for about 20 seconds with ice and then Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pumpkin vodka, .75 oz New York Apple Whisky, .75 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Hot water
Instructions: Steam in steaming tin. Pour in Demitasse glass. Top with heavy whipping cream and nutmeg.

Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Fernet, .34 oz Mezcal, 1.5 oz Fresh lime sweet n' sour mix, 2 oz Pomegranate juice
Instructions: Shake ingredients with ice then strain into a Collins glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Christmas Spirit, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Honey syrup, .5 oz Egg white, 2 oz Ale, 3 drops Dale DeGroff's Pimento Aromatic Bitters
Instructions: Combine all ingredients besides beer and bitters and dry shake without ice. Add ice and re-shake, double strain into a fizz glass and top with beer. Garnish with shaved nutmeg and 3 drops of bitters.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Limoncello, 1 oz Herbal Liqueur
Instructions: Use an empty bottle of 750ml capacity and combine together 12 ounces - 360 ml of each of the two liqueurs and store in the freezer. Serve very cold in a small cordial glass without ice.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Lustau East India Solera, .25 oz Grand Marnier, .25 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .25 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Lemon juice, .75 oz Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), .75 oz Heavy Cream, 2 dash Orange Bitters, 2 oz Club Soda
Instructions: Pour 2 oz. of Club Soda into a Collin’s Glass. Hard shake first fIve ingredients with ice for at 20 seconds. Slowly strain into the Collins glass. Garnish with an orange wedge.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Limoncello, 1 oz Luxardo Bitter, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, 2 oz Club Soda,   Fresh Thyme
Instructions: Place the thyme in a tumbler glass and muddle to release the oils, then add ice and ingredients, stir well and serve.

Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Pear flavored Vodka, .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .5 oz Sherry, 2 dash Bitters
Instructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Chinaco Reposado, 1 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, 1/2 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1/4 oz Fresh Lemon Juice
Instructions: Serve on one big rock.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz Simple syrup, .5 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Luxardo Bitter, 1 float Ginger beer, 4 pieces Pineapple, 4 pieces Ginger root
Instructions: Muddle pineapple and ginger root, lemon juice and simple syrup. Add rum. Shake well, over ice and top with ginger beer and Luxardo Bitter

Instructions:
shake/2strain/coupe

garnish lemon twist

Instructions:
Juice the ingredients and pour into a chilled glass (do not use ice or the drink will lose body).

Top with Pastis Prado or absinthe and garnish with a sprig of mint.

Instructions: Combine all ingredients, minus the sparkling wine, into a tin. Shake and double strain into a flute glass. Top with a float of sparkling wine. Garnish with an edible flower petal.

Instructions: Shake or stir briskly and strain into a cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Peach Puree, .75 oz Lime Juice, 3  Raspberries
Instructions: Muddle raspberries in mixing glass. Add remainder of ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously strain over fresh ice. Garnish with raspberry and mint.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Peach Puree, .75 oz Lime Juice, 3  Raspberries, 1 oz Sparkling Wine
Instructions: Muddle raspberries in mixing glass. Add remainder of ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a well chilled coupe. Top off with sparkling wine. Garnish with raspberry and mint.

Ingredients: rinse Eau de Vie, 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz Carpano Antica, .75 oz Campari, .25 oz Braulio Amaro, 1 pinch Salt
Instructions: Rinse a rocks glass with eau de vie. Combine remaining ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake, and strain over fresh ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon pigtail.

Ingredients: 2 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz St. Germaine Elderflower Liqueur, .5 oz Orgeat Syrup, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice
Instructions: Shake the ingredients with ice. Strain into an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, .5 oz Simple Syrup, .5 oz Orange Juice, .5 oz Lemon, 1 bsp El Guapo Tonic Syrup, 4 dash El Guapo Tonic Bitters, 3  Cucumber Slices, 2  Mint Sprig
Instructions: Muddle mint and cucumber with the simple syrup in a shaker tin. Combine the remainder of the ingredients in the tin. Shake vigorously. Double strain with a fine mesh strainer into a collins glass. Fill with ice and garnish with a cucumber slice.

Ingredients: 1 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 1 oz Lemon curd (or a large bar spoon), 1.5 oz Brut Champagne
Instructions: In a Boston shaker, combine the Karlsson's and the lemon curd with whole hard ice and shake vigorously for 30-40 seconds. Add the champagne to the shaker, stir until mixed well and double strain the cocktail into a 4.5 oz. coupe glass. Garnish the cocktail with a lemon twist making sure to release all the essential oils into the glass. Rub the entire rim with the twist before dropping the twist into the glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Maurin Quina, .25 oz Pineapple Gomme Syrup, 1 bsp Peated Kola Nut Tincture, 2 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Stir. Strain. Lemon peel garnish.

Ingredients: 2 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 1 oz Apricot brandy, .5 oz Dry vermouth, .5 oz Sweet vermouth
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a frozen mixing glass with hard ice and stir for 20 seconds. Strain into a frozen coupe glass.

Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .5 oz Vanilla Agave Nectar, .5 oz Pineapple Gomme Syrup, 1.5 oz Seltzer Water
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and fine strain into Collins glass. Top with seltzer water and add lavender blossom garnish.

Ingredients: 2 oz Chinaco Blanco Tequila, 1.5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, 1 oz Agave Nectar
Instructions: Served in v-shaped rocks glass with "vintage ice".

Ingredients: 1 oz Avua Amburana Cachaça, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Fresh Squeezed Lemon Juice, 1 bag Chai Tea
Instructions:
Soak 1 chai tea bag in half mug of hot water for 30 seconds, remove the tea bag, add all the ingredients, add more hot water. 

Lemon wheel stuffed with 4-5 cloves for garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Orange marmalade syrup, .25 oz Lemon juice, 1 oz Bergamot tea foam
Instructions: Shake all ingredients except foam, strain into chilled cocktail "coupe". Layer foam onto cocktail. Add garnish.

Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, 1 oz Amaro Sibilla, .25 oz Simple syrup,  rinse St. George Absinthe, 3 drops Fee Brothers Orange Flower Water
Instructions: Stir all ingredients except for Absinthe and Orange Flower. Strain over a chunk/sphere of ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint, with 3 drops of Orange Flower.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Chinaco Blanco Tequila, .75 oz Sage-Cilantro-Lime Syrup,  rinse Montanaro Vermouth , 1  Pomegranate Ice Cube
Instructions: Pre-freeze pomegranate juice into one large cube. Rinse a glass with Montanaro vermouth. Dump any excess out. Build the remainder of spirits and bitters into a shaker tin. Shake vigorously. Strain over the pomegranate ice cube into a rocks glass.

Ingredients: Tequila,Orange juice,Grenadine
Instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Stir gently to create the sunrise effect. Garnish and serve.

Ingredients: 2 oz Mezcal, 2 oz Reed's Premium Ginger Brew, 1 tsp Seedless Blackberry Jam, 1  Lime, juiced, 12  Mint Leaves, muddled
Instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add all ingredients except the garnish and shake well. Stain into a very chilled martini glass (martini glass should have a sugar rim on half of the glass) and top with a splash of ginger beer. Garnish with a mint leaf and orange peel. Right before serving drop in a chip of dry ice for the mist.

Ingredients: .75 oz Brandy, .75 oz Green Chartreuse, .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Lemon Juice
Instructions: Shake until very cold; double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. No garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pot still-style Irish Whiskey, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 oz Cocchi Americano, 1 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: Stir ingredients in glass over an ice sphere.

Ingredients: 5  Concord grapes, 3  Blackberries, 1.5 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, 1 oz Crème Yvette, 1 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Egg white
Instructions: Place the Concord grapes and blackberries in a shaker and muddle. Add the rest of the ingredients and ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with Concord grapes and lemon peel twisted to release oils.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vino Chinato, 1.5 oz Fig-Infused C. Drouin Calvados Selection, .5 oz Lemon, .25 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Build in glass. Add crushed ice and swizzle. Top with more crushed ice. Dash pepita tincture on top for aromatics. Garnish with lemon wheel and dried fig.

Ingredients: 2 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker, add ice, shake and strain into a martini glass garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: 1.25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 4 drops Acid phosphate, 2 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, .75 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .25 oz Luxardo Fernet, 3 dash Scrappy's Aromatic Bitters
Instructions:
1st glass ingredients:
Luxardo Maraschino, Acid Phosphate

2nd glass ingredients:
BarSol Quebranta Pisco, Luxardo Amaro Abano, Luxardo Fernet, Scrappy's Aromatic Bitters

Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Dolin Rouge Vermouth, .5 oz The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Orange, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .25 oz Chareau Liqueur, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice,  top Fever-Tree Bitter Lemon
Instructions: Top with Fever-Tree Bitter Lemon. Build in a collins glass full of ice cubes and garnish with a lemon wheel and mint sprig.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 2.5 oz Fresh orange juice, 1 Tbsp Luxardo Bitter, 1 dash Milk powder (or cream)
Instructions: Dry shake, then serve old-fashioned glass with crushed ice. Drizzle Bitter on top to finish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Old Tom Gin, 1 oz Cocchi Vermouth di Torino, .5 oz Luxardo Bitter, 3 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Combine ingredients, stir until well chilled, and strain in to a cocktail glass. Serve with an orange twist.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Gin, 1.5 oz Pineau des Charentes, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
Instructions: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a small wine or cocktail glass. Twist a slice of lemon peel over the drink and use as garnish.

Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Creole Shrub, .75 oz Lemon juice, .25 oz Lemon bitters, .5 oz Simple syrup, 1  Egg white
Instructions: Spray of Lemon Verbana oil on the Martini glass. Combine all other ingredients and dry shake for 20 seconds. Add ice to the mixing tin and shake again. Double strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with fresh lemon verbena. Served in a martini.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Cocchi Americano, .5 oz Salers Gentiane Aperitif, 2 drops Black Licorice-Infused Angostura Bitters, 1 drop Sea Salt Tincture
Instructions: Stir the first three ingredients and the sea salt tincture over ice. Strain into a coupe glass and add licorice-infused Angostura Bitters. Garnish with 3 brandied cherries.

Ingredients: 2.25 oz Gin, 2.25 oz Dry Vermouth, .75 oz Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, .75 oz Cointreau
Instructions: Stir, strain, and serve straight up.

Ingredients: 1.25 oz D'aristi 10 YR Rum, .5 oz The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Blue, .25 oz Tempus Fugit Liqueur de Violettes, 1 oz Lime Juice, .5 oz Tahitian Vanilla Bean Syrup, 1 float Ginger Beer, 3 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Combine rum, curacao, violettes, and lime juice in a shaker, add ice and shake vigorously. Double strain into a chilled collins glass. Add fresh ice in the collins glass and top with chilled ginger beer. Float 2-3 dashes of Angostura Bitters on top and garnish with a grilled pineapple wedge on rim of glass, and two Luxardo Cherries speared through a toothpick, and edible orchid placed on top hanging from the rim.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Amaro, .5 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), .5 oz Strawberry shrub
Instructions: Stir in a mixing glass with ice; strain into a coupe glass; garnish with orange and lemon zest.

Ingredients: 1.25 oz Compass Box Great King Street Glasgow Blend, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Cyril Zangs Double Zero Eau de Vie de Cidre, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Honey Syrup, 1  Egg White
Instructions: Shake without ice, add ice and shake again then fine strain into a chilled egg coupe. Garnish with a Sage leaf.

Ingredients: 2 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Lacuesta Blanco Vermouth, .25 oz Salers Gentiane Aperitif, 1 bsp Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 bsp Germain-Robin Absinthe, 2 dash Scrappy’s Lime Bitters
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and the edible flower of your choice.

Ingredients: Creme de Cacao,Blue Curacao,Light rum
Instructions: Pour ingredients into glass, and drop in a blue whale! The blue whale isn't really necessary, but it makes the drink more "fun".

Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, 1 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 oz Demarara Simple Syrup, 4 dash Apple Bitters
Instructions:
Shake ingredients with ice in shaker and then double strain into a couple glass.
Top with champagne and garnish with lemon and apple slice.

Ingredients: .75 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Peychaud's Bitters, .75 oz Punt e Mes
Instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Ingredients: 35 ml King's Ginger Liqueur, 140 ml Champagne
Instructions: Pour a generous measure of The King's Ginger into a flute. Add chilled Champagne to taste.

Ingredients: 2 oz Rittenhouse Rye, .5 oz Sweet Vermouth, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .25 oz Duplais Swiss Absinthe Verte
Instructions: Stir, strain into an absinthe rinsed coupe. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .25 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Serve on the rocks. Garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 tsp Simple Syrup (1:1), 3 dash Peychaud's Bitters, 1 dash Angostura Bitters,  rinse Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure
Instructions: Put ingredients in mixing glass. Stir. Strain into glass that has absinthe rinse. Add lemon zest.

Ingredients: 2 oz Bourbon, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Simple Syrup, 1 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 dash Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure
Instructions: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into an old fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a Luxardo Cherry and an orange slice or twist.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 3 oz Fever-Tree Tonic Water, 1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Serve over ice in a collins glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 oz Pressed Apple Juice
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an iced up glass with brown sugar rim.

Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .25 oz Briottet Creme de Mure (Blackberry),  top Pear Cider
Instructions: Add all ingredients over ice. Stir with a barspoon. Squeeze lemon wedges and add blackberries.

Ingredients: 1 pkg, 14 oz Cranberries, 1.5 c Brown Sugar, .5 c Orange Juice, .3 c King's Ginger Liqueur, 8 whole Pepper Corns, 6  Allspice Berries, 5  Cloves, 1 stick, 2 in Cinnamon
Instructions: Heat cranberries, sugar, OJ and King's Ginger over medium heat. Place the peppercorns, allspice, cloves and cinnamon in a piece of cheesecloth with the end tied. Add to pot. Cook stirring often until cranberries soften about 25 to 30 min. Refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.

Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .25 oz English Harbour Rum, 3 spoon Sugar, 1 whole Egg, .5 oz Milk, .5 oz Cream
Instructions: Dry shake and then shake with hand cracked ice. Serve in a goblet with grated nutmeg.

Ingredients: 1 oz BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, 1.25 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Peach Brandy, .5 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Egg white
Instructions:
Dry shake, then shake with ice. Double strain into flute or sour glass. Top with a Saison.

Zest orange over top and garnish with a star anise.

Ingredients: 25 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 37.5 oz Cranberry Juice, 37.5 oz Fever-Tree Lemonade
Instructions: Add all ingredients into a punch bowl or pitcher and stir. Add lemon wheels and strawberries to garnish.

Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1.5 oz Cranberry Juice, 1.5 oz Fever-Tree Lemonade
Instructions: Build in a glass over ice. Add lemon wheels and strawberries. Finish with a splash of fresh lemon or top up with some sparkling wine. This drink can also be made in jugs or punch bowls.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Luxardo Fernet, .25 oz BenRiach Curiositas Single Malt 10 YO, .75 oz Lemon Juice
Instructions: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake furiously. Fine strain into chilled coupe. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Ingredients: 2 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 5 oz Hard Apple Cider, 5 oz Fresh Apple Juice
Instructions: Serve in a handled glass, hot or over ice. Garnish with lemon, cinnamon stick and fresh blackberries.

Ingredients: 1 bottle Red Wine, .3 bottle King's Ginger Liqueur, 3 Tbsp Caster Sugar, 2  Lemons, zested (plus flesh of one lemon), 1  Orange, zested, 1 stick Cinnamon, 1 dash Nutmeg, 1  Star Anise
Instructions: Simmer over low heat for 3 hours, double strain with fine sieve.

Ingredients: 50 ml King's Ginger Liqueur, 25 ml Fresh lime, 1 slice Fresh ginger, 4 strawberries Strawberries(muddled)
Instructions: Serve in a tall glass over ice.

Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 oz H by HINE, .25 oz Lemon juice, .25 oz Simple syrup, 2 dash Fee Brothers Rhubard bitters
Instructions: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake and double strain into a glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Ingredients: 35 ml King's Ginger Liqueur, 125 ml Fever-Tree Bitter Lemon
Instructions: Build in ice-filled tall glass, garnish with a squeeze of lime.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 oz Fresh pressed Apple Cider, 4 oz Hard Apple Cider, 1 stick Cinnamon stick
Instructions: Method:  Simmer on a gentle heat for 30 minutes and garnish with a cinnamon stick

Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 3 dash Orange Bitters, 5 oz Sparkling Wine
Instructions: Place King's Ginger and orange bitters in a Champagne flute, and top with sparkling wine. No garnish.

Ingredients: 1 oz Aged Rum, 1 oz Old Potrero Straight Rye Whiskey, .5 oz Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 2 dash Bitters
Instructions: Stir the ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice, strain and serve over ice into an old fashioned glass.

Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 2 dash Fee Brothers Black Walnut Bitters, .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .5 oz Luxardo Fernet
Instructions: In a mixing glass, add the first three ingredients over ice. Stir to chill. In a separate coupe glass, add .5 oz of Luxardo Fernet and swirl glass until it is fully coated with the Fernet. Strain chilled cocktail from mixing glass into the Fernet-rinsed coupe (discard excess fernet). Garnish by placing a Luxardo Cherry into the bottom of the glass.

Ingredients: 50 ml Gin, 20 ml Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 5 ml Luxardo Orgeat Syrup, 5 ml Lemon Juice, 1 dash Absinthe
Instructions: Rinse glass with absinthe. Add a Luxardo Cherry (covered in its juice) to a mixing glass with remaining ingredients. Stir until cold and slightly rose colored. Single strain, serve with cherry from mixing glass.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, 1 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, 2 oz Espresso coffee, 1 scoop Vanilla ice cream
Instructions:
Shake first three ingredients with ice.

Strain over ice cream into prepared glass.

Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Maurin Quina, .75 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Honey Jalapeño syrup, 1 oz Orange juice, .5 oz Lemon juice, 1 oz Soda water
Instructions: Combine all ingredients into a large punch bowl and add large ice cube/cubes. Garnish liberally with slice fruits.

Ingredients: 2 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .25 oz Honey Syrup, 1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and stir for 15-20 seconds. Strain into a highball filled with fresh ice.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Chinaco Blanco Tequila, .75 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, 1 float Bitter Lemon Soda
Instructions: Fill up a stemmed wine glass with ice then pour the ingredients, stir and serve.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Bourbon, .5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz Demerara Syrup (1:1), .75 oz Lemon Juice, 1  Egg White
Instructions: Dry shake all ingredients. Hard shake with ice. Double strain into small pilsner glass. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: 4 oz Ca' Secco Sparkling, 1 bsp Luxardo Cherry Syrup
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a sparkling wine glass.

Ingredients: 25 ml No.3 London Dry Gin, 25 ml King's Ginger Liqueur, 12.5 ml Red Vermouth (Antica Formula), 150 ml Good quality sharp lemonade
Instructions: In a highball glass full of ice add No.3, King's Ginger and red vermouth. Top up with the lemonade and serve with a slice of ginger and a wedge of pink grapefruit.

Ingredients: 1 part No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 part King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 part Red Vermouth (Antica Formula), 6 part Good quality sharp lemonade
Instructions: In a punch bowl add ingredients per person.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz Fresh-pressed Lemon Juice, .5 oz Snake Oil's House-made Sarsaparilla Syrup, .75 oz Carbonated Water, 1 dash Snake Oil's House-made Pomegranate Bitters
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a Collins glass and stir. Garnish with a slice of ginger and lemon wheel.

Ingredients: 30 ml Pink Pigeon Rum, 15 ml Luxardo Aperitivo, 15 ml Red Vermouth, 2 dash Peychaud's Bitters
Instructions: Stir over cubed/vintage ice, double strain into a small chilled martini glass. Garnish with a black olive on a pick.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz FAIR Goji Berry Liqueur, .5 oz Noyeau de Poissy  B, .5 oz Cream, 5 dash Chocolate bitters
Instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with a toasted marshmallow

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, .75 oz Madeira, .75 oz Dolin Dry Vermouth, .25 oz Nux Alpina Walnut Nocino Liqueur, 1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Stir, tastes great up or over a large ice cube with an orange twist.

Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Maurin Quina, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 dash Angostura Bitters, 2 dash Black Walnut Bitters
Instructions: Place all ingredients in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir until proper dilution. Strain over a large hand cut ice cube placed in a double rocks glass. Garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry on a pick.

Ingredients: 50 ml King's Ginger Liqueur, 4  Pink Peppercorns, 25 ml Fresh lemon juice, 15 ml Gomme syrup, 25 ml Egg white
Instructions: Dry shake, then shake with ice. Double strain over cubed ice.

Ingredients: 1.75 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Grapefruit Juice, .5 oz Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or, .25 oz Ginger Syrup, .25 oz Simple Syrup (1.5 : 1)
Instructions: Shake. Serve in small rocks glass with no ice. Grapefruit slice to garnish.

Ingredients: 2.5 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 3-4 dash Angostura Bitters,   Lemon Peel
Instructions: Muddle the lemon peel and bitters with the King’s Ginger to release the oils.  Add scotch, stir, and enjoy.

Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco, 2 dash Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,   Salt
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir until proper dilution. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a sage leaf speared through two cocktail onions.

Ingredients: 2 oz Single Malt Scotch, .25 oz Dry Vermouth, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 2 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir until cold and strain into a chilled coupe.

Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Simple syrup, 2 oz Club soda
Instructions: Add ingredients to a mixing glass except club soda. Shake over ice, strain over ice into a collins glass, top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon wedge and candied ginger on a pick.

Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 4 oz Champagne
Instructions: Pour a generous measure of The King's Ginger into a flute. Add chilled Champagne to taste.

Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve
Instructions: Serve neat or on the rocks.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Orange, .5 oz Lime Juice, 1.5 oz Thai Coconut Milk, 2 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 float Gosslings 151 Rum
Instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into rocks glass and top with crushed ice. Float 1 oz. of Gosslings 151 rum on top.  Garnish with mint and Luxardo Maraschino Cherries.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, 1.5 oz Dry Vermouth, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 2 dash Orange Bitters
Instructions: Stir with ice until cold; strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Express and garnish with lemon.

Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, 1.5 oz Cream of Coconut, .5 oz Fresh pineapple juice, .5 oz Fresh lime juice, 3 dashes Angostura bitters
Instructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth and icy. Pout into a glass and top with 3 dashes of angostura bitters.

Ingredients: 2 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Fresh lemon juice, 1 oz Simple syrup, 5 leaves Mint leaves
Instructions: In a shaker, muddle the mint and simple syrup. Add the lemon juice and gin, and fill with ice. Shake, and double-strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .75 oz Dolin Blanc, 2.5 oz Prosecco
Instructions: Combine Luxardo Bitters and Dolin Blanc. Stir in mixing glass until chilled. Strain into flute. Top with prosecco. Zest with grapefruit. Garnish with long grapefruit zest.

Ingredients: 2 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Luxardo Bitter, 1 bsp Kalani Coconut Liqueur, 1 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 dash Peychaud's Bitters
Instructions: Combine all the ingredients in an old-fashioned glass. Stir on the rocks. Garnish with lemon peel.

Ingredients: 2 oz Banks 5 Island Rum, .75 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .5 oz Fresh Grapefruit Juice, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 tsp Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure
Instructions: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled coupe glass filled with crushed ice.

Ingredients: 2 oz Hot Water, 2 oz Glenrothes, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 dash Honey
Instructions:
Boil water in a tea kettle. 

Squeeze lemon slice into the mug. Insert whole cloves into the lemon slice and drop it into the mug.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Brandy de Jerez (Foie Gras-Infused), 2-3 drops Truffle Tincture,   Atomized Pipe Tobacco Essence
Instructions: Pour brandy into a brandy snifter. Top with 2-3 drops of truffle tincture. Spray Pipe Tobacco Essence on wrist. Smell wrist, sip drink, and enjoy.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur,  top Fever-Tree Ginger Ale, 2 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Pour King's Ginger into an ice-filled collins glass. Top off with Fever-Tree Ginger Ale. Add bitters, and squeeze lime over and serve.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, .75 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Fresh lemon juice, .5 oz Egg white
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice then strain over fresh ice into an old fashioned glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1.5 oz Averna, .75 oz Honey, 1 whole Egg
Instructions: Combine all ingredients, shake for 20 seconds. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a snifter. Garnish with shaved nutmeg.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Chamucos Blanco Tequila, .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .5 oz Thyme Simple Syrup, .5 oz Lime Juice
Instructions: Shaken.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Citrus-flavored Vodka, .75 oz Luxardo Limoncello, .5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, 1 oz Fresh sweet n' sour, .5 oz Egg white
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, 1 oz Yogurt Liquor, .5 oz Milk, .5 oz Golden Sesame Honey, 1 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 tsp Matcha Tea
Instructions: Shake and strain into rocks glass.

Ingredients: 1 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Orange Juice, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .25 oz Batavia Arrack, .5 oz Simple Syrup, 1 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Mix all ingredients together.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Aged Rum, 1 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, 1 oz Passion fruit puree, 2 oz Fresh lime sweet n' sour, 2 dash Bitters, 1 float Coconut foam
Instructions: Shake the first five ingredients with ice then strain over fresh ice into a Collins or Tiki glass. Top with coconut foam.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Plantation Pineapple Rum, 1 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), .5 oz Ancho Reyes, 3 dash House-made Roasted Banana Bitters
Instructions: Stir with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass over small ice cubes. Garnish with an orange twist.

Ingredients: .5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz Campari, .5 oz Dry Vermouth
Instructions: Stir, strain, and serve straight up. Express zest and garnish.

Ingredients: Gin,Vodka,Lillet Blanc
Instructions: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.

Ingredients: 2.25 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .75 oz Hophead Vodka, .5 oz Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or
Instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with lemon peel.

Ingredients: 1 oz Van Gogh Blue Vodka, 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Lillet Blanc, .25 oz St. Germain
Instructions: Shake ingredients very well with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with lemon and orange twists.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Chinaco Blanco Tequila, .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1.5 oz Lime Sweet n' Sour mix,  oz Cucumber wheels,  oz Sprigs of Mint
Instructions: Place the mint and cucumber in a mixing glass and muddle briskly, then add sour mix and liquor. Shake with ice and double strain over ice into a stemmed glass.

Ingredients: .75 oz Rye Whiskey, .75 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco, 1 bsp Benedictine, 2 dash Angostura Bitters, 2 dash Peychaud's Bitters
Instructions: In a mixing glass, add all ingredients, then fill halfway with ice. Stir with a barspoon until chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Rub the lemon twist around the rim, drop it in the cocktail, and serve.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, .5 oz Lemon Juice, 1 dash Simple Syrup
Instructions: Serve in a rocks glass with an orange peel garnish and a Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, .5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz Benedictine, .5 oz Orange juice, .5 oz Honey
Instructions: Fill a mug with very hot water to warm the glass up. Once the glass is hot, empty it and add all the liquid ingredients. Stir well until the honey is incorporated. Garnish with the clove studded orange peel and enjoy.

Ingredients: 1 oz Mezcal, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, .5 oz Old Tom Gin, .5 oz Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or, 1 dash Duplais Swiss Absinthe Verte
Instructions: Stir, strain into absinthe rinsed double rocks glass over big cube. Garnish with lemon peel.

Ingredients: 2 oz Bourbon, 1 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .5 oz Small Hand Foods Pineapple Gum Syrup, .5 oz Egg White
Instructions: Add all ingredients and dry-shake (without ice), then add ice, and shake again. Strain into coupe and garnish with rhubarb bitters.

Ingredients: .75 c Junipero Gin, .75 c C. Drouin Calvados Selection, .5 c Lemon Juice, .5 c Ginger-Vanilla Syrup, 4 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 bottle Sparkling Rose
Instructions: Add all ingredients into a punch bowl. Serve in small rocks glasses.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Pineapple Juice, .5 oz Monin Strawberry Puree, 6-7  Mint Leaves, .5 oz Lemon Sour, 1 oz Lemon Lime Soda
Instructions: Add all ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with lime pinwheel and bing cherry.

Ingredients: 1 oz Hophead Vodka, 1 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Maurin Quina
Instructions: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice. Stir until proper dilution and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with an orange peel.

Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, 1 oz Small Hand Foods Orgeat, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, 3 dash Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Shake, strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with lemon twist.

Ingredients: 2 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), .5 oz Lemon Juice, 1  Egg White
Instructions: Shake well with cracked ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .75 oz Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .5 oz Egg White
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 2 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 2 dash Orange Bitters, 1 bsp Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into chilled cocktail coupe or Nick & Nora. Expel lemon peel over cocktail then place in glass.

Ingredients: 1 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .25 oz Green Chartreuse, .75 oz Sweetened Apple Cider, 2 dash Baked Apple Bitters, 1 whole Egg
Instructions: Dry shake whole egg until emulsified. Then add Kold Draft ice and all ingredients except bitters and shake vigorously until cold. Strain into chilled royal coupette and garnish with apple wheels.

Ingredients: 1 oz Old Potrero Straight Rye Whiskey, 1.5 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), 1 bsp Luxardo Amaro Abano, 1 dash Angostura bitters
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice and stir. Strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, .75 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .5 oz Egg White
Instructions: Shake ingredients with ice until well combined. Strain into a chilled tumbler or large rocks glass over ice sphere or large ice cubes. Garnish with orange peel (or slice) and Luxardo Original Maraschino Cherries on a pick.

Ingredients: 2 oz Barr Hill Honey Gin, 1 oz Lemon Juice, .25 oz Liquid Alchemist Orgeat, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 bsp Dijon Blue Curaçao
Instructions: Spray the inside of the glass with absinthe, then sugar the external rim of the glass. Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into the glass.

Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 1 oz Fresh lime juice
Instructions:
Muddle a small handful of fresh mint leaves, ¾ oz simple syrup (equal parts sugar and water) 
1 oz fresh lime juice.
Add crushed ice to the glass to fill half way.
pour in 2 oz of Pink Pigeon.
Swizzle to incorporate ingredients and slowly add in the rest of the crushed ice.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Smith & Cross, .5 oz Strawberry juice, .5 oz Black tea syrup, .5 oz Lemon juice, 2 dashes Orange bitters
Instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an ice-filled collins glass.

Ingredients: White Rum,Galliano,Triple Sec,Lime Juice
Instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, 1 oz Dolin Dry Vermouth, .5 tsp Giffard Banane du Brésil, .5 tsp Honey Syrup
Instructions: Served up with a lemon peel garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Bonal, .5 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .25 oz Nocino
Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass. Stir until 2 oz water is diluted. Strain into a sherry or nosing glass. Flame and discard an orange peel. Drink deeply.

Ingredients: .75 oz Blanco Tequila, .75 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .75 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .75 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .25 oz Rich Simple Syrup (2:1)
Instructions: Mount all ingredients in a shaker tin. Add ice. Hard shake. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with orange twist.

Ingredients: 2 part Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Classica, 1 part Fresh Lime Juice, .5 part Agave, .5 part Ancho Reyes Ancho Chile Liqueur
Instructions: For a punch, combine Ypioca, lime, agave and Ancho Reyes together. Add fresh pineapple chunks, 3 thin sliced chiles (seeds included) and 1 star anise to garnish.

Ingredients: 1.5 oz Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 oz Pineapple Juice, .5 oz Simple Syrup, 2 oz Coconut Water, 1 fill Soda Water
Instructions: Build all into highball. Fill with ice. Top with soda water. Place pineapple leaf vertically in the glass.

Ingredients: Amaretto,Rum,Kool-Aid
Instructions: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and ammaretto. shake well to disolve the sugar in the Kool-Aid... serve cold

Ingredients: Vodka,Ouzo
Instructions: Prepare like a Martini. Garnish with a green olive.
